title: For Sale: SGC Graded T206 Southern Leaguers **Prices Reduced before eBay**
author: T206BrownHindu

posts.post_title: For Sale: SGC Graded T206 Southern Leaguers **Prices Reduced before eBay**
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell the below Southern Leaguers.  Will also consider trades for T206 Brown Hindu's that I need or T206 SGC 60s (or better) or T206 SGC 50 (or better) Southern Leaguers.  Paypal is fine.  All prices delivered.  Please PM me with interest.  Scans are included in the SGC link below.

Ed Foster Piedmont SGC 30-$225
Charlie Fritz Piedmont SGC 30-$80
George Paige Piedmont SGC 40-$85

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=1578&userset=3933[/url]

Thanks for looking,
Mark
Email sent for Cad Coles Old Mill SGC 40-$100

J. Ross Helm Old Mill SGC 10-$25
Woodie Thornton Old Mill SGC 20-$35

Thanks

Jantz

Last bump for these cards, thanks to everyone that has purchased so far!
